Manchester United, F.A. Cup Final, 1983. ...And Smith Must Score! Five yards out, an open goal \u2014 ' and not a man in sight.... -\u2014 T/hememoryofthatawfulmiss j W s still haunts me late at nighty Ten seconds left in extra time and history in the making but Smith\u2019s shot hit the goalie\u2019s legs and now our hearts are breaking A paraplegic lem m ing with the skill of a dead cat and the finesse of a hamster could have done better than that! A decom posing dogfish w rapped in bondage, head to toe could have stuck that ball into the net but Gordon Smith? Oh, no! When Robinson broke down the left and put the ball across we knew for sure the Seagulls\u2019 win was Man United\u2019s loss And as old Smithy shaped to shoot a mighty roar went up - T h e im possible had happened! WE\u2019D WON TFIE F.A.CUP! A fleeting glim pse o f glory: alas, \u2019twas not to be... lost the replay 4-0 now we\u2019re in Division Three The one chance of a lifetime so cruelly snatched away But till the white coats come for me I\u2019ll ne\u2019er forget that day... 57 \u2014 VO ■e R>r tue Spofts Jkstc , kvt^ fvbi/u [AthOx KU -I rlvuAtuoL afattufiJlc Mu* \u2014 !(!] ^ \n￼' T/the vam pire free, unchained, unstaked f\\ ,and now sick men - it\u2019s always men - are harnessing the stinking vulture lurking in the hum an soul and flaunting it as video culture Film -m akers, im potent and scared w ith shrivelled pricks and sick desires hate women so they burn their breasts or wrench their nipples off with pliers f \\hipsters in the glossy press say \u2018W hat\u2019s the fuss? It\u2019s special effects.\u2019 It\u2019s real enough in those bastards\u2019 m inds - I want to break their fucking necks! And what of those who watch the films of Nazis raping Jewish mothers? Do they sit there, and wank, and spout wish they\u2019d been there beside the others then play with children of their own like S.S. butchers used to do? Look in the mirror, nasty man - see Adolf Eichmann stare at you! Video Nazis i.e. \u2014the new breed of sadistic crypto-fascists who enjoy making or watching films depicting other human beings being tortured and destroyed in a variety of hideous ways (and don\u2019t tell me it\u2019s only a m ovie...) In Rome the gladiators fought while people slobbered in the stands P/the bloodlust rose, the voyeurs wanked w ith transfixed gaze and frenzied hands T^hen naked humans thrown to beasts were torn apart amidst the cheers TUheir last entreaties drowned in blood and wine-soaked sick sadistic jeers And still it swells, the evil lust centuries old and still unslaked TVhe cesspitofthe human mind \n￼Attila 48-64 18/9/92 7:47 am Page 60 In 1982, after Lord Denning had ruled Ken Livingstone\u2019s GLC fares policy illegal, forcing massive increases in London Transport fares, I wrote a piece called \u2018Awayday\u2019 about the perils of a day out in London with the Law Lords. In the light of (Ex Comrade) Yeltsin\u2019s activities in Russia I thought it was time for an update \u2014so here we go on the perils of a day\u2019s shopping in the new, \u2018democratic\u2019 \u2018CIS\u2019 (which I always thought meant Co-operative Insurance Society, actually) woke up got up read the post attacked the postman took the rat for a walk but hordes of starving children grabbed it and ate it raw came back fed the amoeba but it still wasn\u2019t big enough to be seen with the naked eye so i thought i\u2019d fatten it up a bit more before i put it in the casserole emptied the flower pot and made some coffee invented a new machine which produces genuine 100% beef hamburgers out of old copies of lenin\u2019s memoirs while sim  ultaneously reconciling the armenians and azerbajanis wrote a pas  sionate love letter to the head of cis food distribution who happens to be a small crucian carp then thought i\u2019m bored think i\u2019ll go to moscow cos moscow\u2019s got to be more interesting than the eec cater  ing size frankfurter tin i\u2019ve lived in since my house was repossessed e by the original pre-revolutionary owners and i might be able to pick up some bucks fizz bootlegs or the latest jean-paul sartre dub lp got the bus two hours late got the train four hours late train was delayed for a week due to huge crowds of pimps drug dealers americans gangsters child pornographers and manic street preachers fans celebrating the restoration of capitalism and the collapse of soviet power got to moscow went into the bread shop queued for nine hours loaf of bread please sure mate that\u2019ll be a hundred roubles what d\u2019you mean a hundred roubles it was only ten kopeks last week i\u2019m not paying a hundred roubles for a loaf of bread sorry mate i know it was only ten kopeks last week but an unstable semi  alcoholic CE^jffinaftaakt egomaniac authoritarian opportunist who spent forty odd years as an unquestioning stalinist apparatchik slav  ishly toeing the party line had a few words with margaret thatcher and then reconstituted himself as a paragon of freedom jby-w gfm ising a-fitlw-army-coup :rm>iTtofrmg ever so.brav^-by-staftdwg-Qjt-a taak surrounded-hat his jcia backers)has taken power and turned the country into a devil take the hindmost and sod you mate milton friedman obsessed dump where everything that moves is privatised and the prices have gone up ten thousand per cent that\u2019ll be a 60 \n￼<5 * (Jjl -Q- again-and\u2014this\u2014time we\u2019re not perestroika with selling uut to capitalism and~our slogan, manifesto and program m e- is. going to he hread peace and land.. anH hnlW -le m iW \u2014 I----- Attila 48-64 18/9/92 7:47 am Page 61 hundred roubles please...bollocks to that i said and after a short pregnant pause all the people behind me in the queue plucked up courage and said bollocks to that and all the homeless starving people begging in the streets said bollocks to that
